title: Himemiya-san, a Maiden and Cute Girl in Front of Me - Novel Updates
tags: Early Romance   First Love   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Megumi Amane
description:
Yuto Okugawa is a high school student who works at a coffee shop part-time during summer vacation. One day at work he meets the most popular girl in high school, nicknamed 'Maiden of Amanodate', who as her name says, happens to be the most desired girl by men, and the most admired among women. 

But unforeseen events made Kanade Himemiya take notice of Yuto, to the point that a romantic attraction was born in her. 
The story of how the maiden rejected every man who declared his love for her, falls for the charms of her classmate after saving her from a serious situation begins.>
